decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s):

Location Plan, AP-10-00 (Existing Block Plan), AP-11-00 (Proposed Block Plan) AP-20-00 (Existing Ground Floor Plan), AP-20-01 (Existing First Floor Plan), AP-20-02 (Existing Loft Floor Plan), AP-20-03 (Existing Roof Plan), AE-30-00 (Existing South Elevation), AE-30-01 (Existing South Elevation Fence), AE-30-02 (Existing West Elevation), AE-30-03 (Existing North Elevation), AE-30-04 (Existing Party Wall Elevation), AS-40-00 (Existing Section A-A), AS-40-01 (Existing Section B-B), AS-40-02 (Existing Section C-C), AP-21-00 (Proposed Ground Floor Plan), AP-21-01 (Proposed First Floor Plan), AP-21-02 (Proposed Loft Plan), AP-21-03 (Proposed Roof Plan), AE-31-00 (Proposed South Elevation), AE-31-01 (Proposed South Elevation Fence), AE-31-02 (Proposed West Elevation), AE-31-03 (Proposed North Elevation), AE-31-04 (Proposed Party Wall Elevation), AS-41-00 (Proposed Section A-A), AS-41-01 (Proposed Section B-B), AS-41-02 (Proposed Section C-C), Design and Access Statement dated June 2024

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).

| The hereby approved ^IN; rooflights to the roof slope of the hereby approved development shall not project more than 150mm from the plane of the roof slope when measured perpendicularly and shall be retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, and to safeguard the character and appearance of the  area in accordance with policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013). | The proposed ^IN; on the side elevations shall contain only obscure glass and only have top openings at a minimum of 1.7m from floor level.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties in accordance with policies D3 and D6 of the London Plan (2021), policies policy 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012).
description: Roof extension to rear (main) roof slope; part rear roof extension to rear outrigger roof slope incorporating Juliet Balcony and installation of two roof lights to front roof slope and one rooflight to the rear roof slope; Alteration to boundary fence; Removal of Chimney
